root.content: Production-readiness hardening of HiveFiver + remediation stack with full SRC integrity validation

children.content: Run deep audit of SRC logic/dataflow/lifecycle/edge-cases with focus on HiveFiver todo/orchestrator-ralph integration and return-automation guarantees

Blocked-state acknowledged from prior subagent failure; proceeding with read-only stress journey audit for HiveFiver TODO + orchestrator-ralph integration.

Independent quality-gate verification run: git status/diff, typecheck, targeted tests, full test suite (read-only).

Residual stale-session hook write leak fixed via queued mutation path with in-memory pending projection; focused + full tests green and patch review approved
